data.caption: Resume of Operations
data.news_body:
With reference to the earlier letter dated March 23, 2020, wherein the Company had informed of the disruption of operations across the country on account of the COVID -19 pandemic. Salona Cotspin Ltd has now informed BSE that in accordance with the guidelines issued by Government of India and various State Government Authorities, the Company has partially resumed operations at its manufacturing location, warehouses, and offices wherein lockdown restrictions have been eased with effect from May 07, 2020. The operations at these locations will be carried out in accordance with the guidelines issued by the regulatory authorities, after obtaining permissions wherever required. The Company has taken all the required measures to ensure the safety of its employees at all locations in accordance with the guidance issued by the Central/State/Municipal authorities.

The Company will continue to monitor the situation closely and take appropriate action as per regulatory guidelines.
